news.title: Intro to 3D Printing: build your own 3D object
news.description: This workshop is to give an introduction on how to use 3D printer Flashforge. You will also be able to create your own 3D project. Snacks are available!
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva

news.title: Get comfortable with Vinyl Cutter and make your own vinyl stickers
news.description: This workshop is dedicated to give students the chance to learn how to use vinyl cutter and build their own designs for stickers
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva

news.title: Make a card for your friend with FormLab 3D printer
news.description: Create any kind of 3D object from scratch and make a gift for your friend!
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva
